body: %s means that you intend to use a varchar input, which is nice on your PHP end where you pass the $mysqltable_name text, but on MySQL level the query to be executed will contain apostrophes around $mysqltable_name since it is a varchar. You need to use string concatenation or hard-coded table name to avoid it in your PHP code. If your table name is dynamic, then you need to make sure it will not contain harmful code.
title: Error using $wpdb->prepare()
